items.headline: My friend cosigned a loan for a BMW, but the driver defaulted. They’re both on the hook for $5K. What happens now?

items.headline: ‘I love my work’: I’m a 61-year-old public-school teacher and have a $60K pension. Is it safe?

items.headline: UNC coach Bill Belichick sells his charming Nantucket cottage for $3.8 million
